__e: So, my dear girl, you will go home straight away and make those horrible gossips stop by never seeing that man again.
"To quiet your critics. They always say what you can and can't do. You just work as hard as you can and everything else will happen like it should."
Yeah... all we can do right now is shut up and eat.
He told me to shut up and turn around. Don't look.
Just told him to shut up, and he did.
There are occasions when it is necessary to keep silent to be able to listen to music through the noise of rain.
I told my people to keep quiet so this wouldn't happen.
This time, I'll silence it forever.
Aren't you a criminal? Start by quelling the monster within yourself!
I'm going to shut you up first.
Let me tell you something. I stopped talking back... when it became hazardous to my health, you know?
It's hard not to talk about something that's constantly on your mind.
I told you to shut him up.
I can do better. I can shut you up forever!
Yeah, well, I guess we're all shut up in our own way.
But one word from you will silence me on this subject forever.
